languages.text: {n}Ободренная, девушка начинает излагать тоном матерого чиновника {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g}:{/n} "Мы предлагаем возвести цепь пустотных станций-маяков — плазменных факелов, подающих сигналы окружающим кораблям. Разместив их в логистически просчитанных точках, мы упростим маршруты кораблей, которые смогут разбить длинные {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-прыжки на серию более безопасных кратких прыжков от маяка до маяка. Это благотворно скажется на общей безопасности перелетов и доступности колоний".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ободренная, девушка начинает излагать тоном матерого чиновника Администратума:{/n} "Мы предлагаем возвести цепь пустотных станций-маяков — плазменных факелов, подающих сигналы окружающих кораблям. Разместив их в логистически просчитанных точках, мы упростим маршруты кораблей, которые смогут разбить длинные варп-прыжки на серию более безопасных кратких прыжков от маяка до маяка. Это благотворно скажется на общей безопасности перелетов и доступности колоний".

languages.text: {n}Heartened, Astartia continues in the tone of a seasoned {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk,{/n} "Our suggestion is to set up a chain of stations in the void — plasma beacons that would signal the passing ships. By placing them in logistically sound locations, we could simplify our ships' routes so that they may split long {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jumps into a series of safer, shorter jumps from one beacon to another. This would have a positive effect on the overall safety of journeys and the accessibility of colonies."
languages.original_text: {n}Ободренная, девушка начинает излагать тоном матерого чиновника {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g}:{/n} "Мы предлагаем возвести цепь пустотных станций-маяков — плазменных факелов, подающих сигналы окружающим кораблям. Разместив их в логистически просчитанных точках, мы упростим маршруты кораблей, которые смогут разбить длинные {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-прыжки на серию более безопасных кратких прыжков от маяка до маяка. Это благотворно скажется на общей безопасности перелетов и доступности колоний".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heartened, Astartia continues in the tone of a seasoned Administratum clerk,{/n} "Our suggestion is to set up a chain of beacon stations in the void — plasma torches that would signal the passing ships. By placing them in logistically sound locations, we could simplify our ships' routes so that they may split long warp jumps into series of safer, shorter jumps from one beacon to another. This would have a positive effect on the overall safety of flights and the accessibility of colonies."

By placing them in logistically sound locations, we could simplify our ships' routes so that they may split long warp jumps into series of safer, shorter jumps from one beacon to another. This would have a positive effect on the overall safety of flights and the accessibility of colonies."

By placing them in logistically sound locations, we could simplify our ships' routes so that they may split long {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jumps into a series of safer, shorter jumps from one beacon to another. {n}Heartened, Astartia continues in the tone of a seasoned {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk,{/n} "Our suggestion is to set up a chain of stations in the void — plasma beacons that would signal the passing ships. By placing them in logistically sound locations, we could simplify our ships' routes so that they may split long {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jumps into a series of safer, shorter jumps from one beacon to another. This would have a positive effect on the overall safety of journeys and the accessibility of colonies."

languages.text: {n}元気づけられたアスタルチアは、熟練の{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}行政局{/g}員の調子で続ける。{/n}「ヴォイドに一連のステーションを設けてはいかがでしょうか。通過するシップに対し、プラズマビーコンが合図を出します。ビーコンを流通上重要な拠点に設置すれば航路を簡略化して、長期の{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}ジャンプを、ひとつのビーコンから次のビーコンまでのジャンプに分割して安全性の向上と期間の短縮を図れるのです。これにより、航海の総合的な安全性とコロニーへのアクセスにいい影響が見られるはずです」
languages.original_text: {n}Heartened, Astartia continues in the tone of a seasoned {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk,{/n} "Our suggestion is to set up a chain of stations in the void — plasma beacons that would signal the passing ships. By placing them in logistically sound locations, we could simplify our ships' routes so that they may split long {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jumps into a series of safer, shorter jumps from one beacon to another. This would have a positive effect on the overall safety of journeys and the accessibility of colonies."

traits.locale_text: {n}元気づけられたアスタルチアは、熟練の{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}行政局{/g}員の調子で続ける。{/n}「ヴォイドに一連のステーションを設けてはいかがでしょうか。通過するシップに対し、プラズマビーコンが合図を出します。ビーコンを流通上重要な拠点に設置すれば航路を簡略化して、長期の{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}ジャンプを、ひとつのビーコンから次のビーコンまでのジャンプに分割して安全性の向上と期間の短縮を図れるのです。これにより、航海の総合的な安全性とコロニーへのアクセスにいい影響が見られるはずです」

languages.text: {n}得到你的鼓励之后，艾丝塔西娅以娴熟的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}官员的语气继续说了下去。{/n}“我们打算在虚空中建立一连串的站点，也就是等离子信标，向过往船只发出信号。只要能把这些信标安置在符合后勤要求的地点，我们就可以简化飞船的航线，把{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}漫长的跳跃拆分成信标之间的跳跃。这样以来，亚空间的跳跃就会变得更短、更加安全，对旅程的安全性与航线的稳定性带来积极影响。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heartened, Astartia continues in the tone of a seasoned {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk,{/n} "Our suggestion is to set up a chain of stations in the void — plasma beacons that would signal the passing ships. By placing them in logistically sound locations, we could simplify our ships' routes so that they may split long {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jumps into a series of safer, shorter jumps from one beacon to another. This would have a positive effect on the overall safety of journeys and the accessibility of colonies."

traits.locale_text: {n}得到你的鼓励之后，艾丝塔西娅以娴熟的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}官员的语气继续说了下去。{/n}“我们打算在虚空中建立一连串的站点，也就是等离子信标，向过往船只发出信号。只要能把这些信标安置在符合后勤要求的地点，我们就可以简化飞船的航线，把{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}漫长的跳跃拆分成信标之间的跳跃。这样以来，亚空间的跳跃就会变得更短、更加安全，对旅程的安全性与航线的稳定性带来积极影响。”

languages.text: {n}Esperanzada, Astartia continúa con el tono de una avezada funcionaria del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}.{/n} «Nuestra solución pasa por establecer una serie de estaciones en el vacío: balizas de plasma que sirvan de faro para las naves de paso. Al colocarlas en posiciones adecuadas desde un punto de vista logístico, podríamos simplificar las rutas de nuestras naves y dividir los saltos de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} más largos en varios saltos entre las balizas. Esto aumentaría la seguridad de los viajes y mejoraría la accesibilidad de las colonias».
languages.original_text: {n}Heartened, Astartia continues in the tone of a seasoned {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk,{/n} "Our suggestion is to set up a chain of stations in the void — plasma beacons that would signal the passing ships. By placing them in logistically sound locations, we could simplify our ships' routes so that they may split long {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jumps into a series of safer, shorter jumps from one beacon to another. This would have a positive effect on the overall safety of journeys and the accessibility of colonies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Esperanzada, Astartia continúa con el tono de una avezada funcionaria del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}.{/n} «Nuestra solución pasa por establecer una serie de estaciones en el vacío: balizas de plasma que sirvan de faro para las naves de paso. Al colocarlas en posiciones adecuadas desde un punto de vista logístico, podríamos simplificar las rutas de nuestras naves y dividir los saltos de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} más largos en varios saltos entre las balizas. Esto aumentaría la seguridad de los viajes y mejoraría la accesibilidad de las colonias».

languages.text: {n}Revigorée par votre intervention, Astartia reprend sur un ton digne d'un clerc de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} :{/n} « Nous suggérons de mettre en place une chaîne de stations dans l'espace, des balises à plasma qui enverraient des signaux aux vaisseaux de passage. En les disposant de manière stratégique, les vaisseaux pourraient sauter de balise en balise pour grandement simplifier leurs trajets et limiter les risques qu'engendrent les longs voyages dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. Un tel système aurait un effet positif sur la sûreté des allées et venues de nos vaisseaux et sur l'accessibilité des colonies. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heartened, Astartia continues in the tone of a seasoned {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk,{/n} "Our suggestion is to set up a chain of stations in the void — plasma beacons that would signal the passing ships. By placing them in logistically sound locations, we could simplify our ships' routes so that they may split long {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jumps into a series of safer, shorter jumps from one beacon to another. This would have a positive effect on the overall safety of journeys and the accessibility of colonies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Revigorée par votre intervention, Astartia reprend sur un ton digne d'un clerc de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} :{/n} « Nous suggérons de mettre en place une chaîne de stations dans l'espace, des balises à plasma qui enverraient des signaux aux vaisseaux de passage. En les disposant de manière stratégique, les vaisseaux pourraient sauter de balise en balise pour grandement simplifier leurs trajets et limiter les risques qu'engendrent les longs voyages dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. Un tel système aurait un effet positif sur la sûreté des allées et venues de nos vaisseaux et sur l'accessibilité des colonies. »

languages.text: {n}Ermutigt spricht Astartia im Tonfall einer erfahrenen Angestellten des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratums{/g} weiter{/n}: "Wir schlagen die Einrichtung einer Kette von Stationen in der Leere vor – Plasmasignale für passierende Schiffe. Durch logistisch sinnvolle Platzierung könnten wir die Routen unserer Schiffe vereinfachen und lange {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warpsprünge{/g} in mehrere sicherere, kürzere Sprünge von Signal zu Signal aufteilen. Das hätte positive Auswirkungen auf die allgemeine Sicherheit von Reisen und die Erreichbarkeit von Kolonien."
languages.original_text: {n}Heartened, Astartia continues in the tone of a seasoned {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk,{/n} "Our suggestion is to set up a chain of stations in the void — plasma beacons that would signal the passing ships. By placing them in logistically sound locations, we could simplify our ships' routes so that they may split long {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jumps into a series of safer, shorter jumps from one beacon to another. This would have a positive effect on the overall safety of journeys and the accessibility of colonies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ermutigt spricht Astartia im Tonfall einer erfahrenen Angestellten des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratums{/g} weiter{/n}: "Wir schlagen die Einrichtung einer Kette von Stationen in der Leere vor – Plasmasignale für passierende Schiffe. Durch logistisch sinnvolle Platzierung könnten wir die Routen unserer Schiffe vereinfachen und lange {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warpsprünge{/g} in mehrere sicherere, kürzere Sprünge von Signal zu Signal aufteilen. Das hätte positive Auswirkungen auf die allgemeine Sicherheit von Reisen und die Erreichbarkeit von Kolonien."

languages.text: {n}Cesaret bulan Astartia, tecrübeli bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} kâtibinin ses tonuyla lafına devam ediyor.{/n} "Tavsiyemiz, uçsuzda bir dizi istasyon kurmak... Bunlar, geçen gemilere sinyal gönderecek plazma parıldakları olacak. Bunları lojistik açıdan uygun yerlere yerleştireceğiz. Böylece uzun {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öte{/g} sıçramalarını, bir parıldaktan diğerine gerçekleştirilen bir dizi daha kısa ve güvenli sıçramalara bölerek gemi seyahat rotalarını kısaltacağız. Bu durum da genel seyahat güvenliğine ve kolonilere ulaşılabilirliğe olumlu bir etkide bulunacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Heartened, Astartia continues in the tone of a seasoned {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk,{/n} "Our suggestion is to set up a chain of stations in the void — plasma beacons that would signal the passing ships. By placing them in logistically sound locations, we could simplify our ships' routes so that they may split long {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jumps into a series of safer, shorter jumps from one beacon to another. This would have a positive effect on the overall safety of journeys and the accessibility of colonies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cesaret alan Astartia, tecrübeli bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} kâtibinin ses tonuyla lafına devam ediyor.{/n} "Tavsiyemiz, uçsuzda bir dizi istasyon kurmak... Bunlar, geçen gemilere sinyal gönderecek plazma parıldakları olacak. Bunları lojistik açıdan uygun yerlere yerleştireceğiz. Böylece uzun {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öte{/g} sıçramalarını, bir parıldaktan diğerine giden bir dizi daha kısa ve daha güvenli sıçramalara bölerek gemi rotalarını kolaylaştıracağız. Bu durum da genel seyahat güvenliğine ve kolonilerin benimsenirliğine olumlu bir etkide bulunacaktır."
